changeSet.author: pavwebdev
changeSet.sql: insert into office365License values (1, "Advanced Threat Protection", "ATP_ENTERPRISE", 51200), (2, "Enterprise E3", "ENTERPRISEPACK", 51200), (3, "Enterprise E1", "EXCHANGESTANDARD", 51200), (4, "Business Essentials", "O365_BUSINESS_ESSENTIALS", 51200), (5, "Business Premium", "O365_BUSINESS_PREMIUM", 51200), (6, "Power Bi", "POWER_BI_PRO", 51200), (7, "Power Bi", "POWER_BI_STANDARD", 51200), (8, "Business Essentials", "SMB_BUSINESS_ESSENTIALS", 51200), (9, "Business Premium", "SMB_BUSINESS_PREMIUM", 51200), (10, "Enterprise E1", "STANDARDPACK", 51200), (11, "Enterprise E2", "STANDARDWOFFPACK", 51200), (12, "Intune", "INTUNE_A", 51200), (13, "MS Visio", "VISIOCLIENT", 51200), (14, "Flow", "FLOW_Free", 51200), (15, "Dynamics 365 P1 Trial for Information Workers", "DYN365_ENTERPRISE_P1_IW", 51200), (16, "MS Project Professional", "PROJECTPROFESSIONAL", 51200), (17, "Office 365 ProPlus", "OFFICESUBSCRIPTION", 51200), (18, "Exchange Archiving Online", "EXCHANGEENTERPRISE", 51200), (19, "MS Teams", "TEAMS_COMMERCIAL_TRIAL", 51200), (20, "MS Teams", "MS_TEAMS_IW", 51200), (21, "Office 365 ProPlus for students", "OFFICESUBSCRIPTION_STUDENT", 51200), (22, "Enterprise E2 for students", "EXCHANGEENTERPRISE_STUDENT", 51200), (23, "Office 365 A1 for students", "STANDARDWOFFPACK_STUDENT", 51200), (24, "Office 365 A1 for faculty", "STANDARDWOFFPACK_FACULTY", 51200)
insert into db_sequence values ('office365license', 24) ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE nextid = 24
